title: #287: Big Buck Hunter (@JoeRogan)
itunes:title: Big Buck Hunter with Joe Rogan
description: Joe Rogan met me at the Improv in LA to tell me all about his obsession with hunting. He's been a hardcore hunter for about 4 years now. And he broke down why he does it, what it's like out there, the backlash, the weaponry, all of it. It made me want to go out and kill something. Animals, probably, but people will do.
